text: Following Saturday Night Live's season premiere, cast member Pete Davidson posted his very first Instagram after wiping his profile clean earlier this summer. It was just a polaroid of himself, with the caption ` ` hooray romano.'' And it was enough for his fianc√©e Ariana Grande for life. Grande commented twice under the photo, writing ` ` where the mixtape'' and then ` ` this is sick and ur page looks cool never post again.'' Instagram Of course she's just joking as they did when they were posting Instagrams regularly and commenting on the other's every photo in the summer.
